sat_img_classifier

Module Contents

Classes

SatelliteImageClassifier

Class defining example client use case for land use classification CNN model.

Functions

_natural_sort(list_to_sort)

Function to perform natural sort on given list.
sat_img_classifier._natural_sort(list_to_sort)

Function to perform natural sort on given list.

Parameters

list_to_sort – list to be sorted using natural sort algorithm

Returns

list sorted in natural sort order

class sat_img_classifier.SatelliteImageClassifier(paths, network_name, sat_images: list)

Class defining example client use case for land use classification CNN model.

_load_sat_image_as_array(self, sat_image)

Function to load a satellite image and resize its width and height to multiplication of 64.

Parameters

sat_image – str name of satellite image to be loaded as numpy array.

Returns

numpy array representing given satellite image

_split_sat_image_to_tiles(self, sat_image)

Function to split satellite image into multiple 64x64 tiles, which are saved locally.

Parameters

sat_image – str name of satellite image to be splitted into 64x64 tiles.

Returns

dict containing image dimensions in number of tiles

_predict_land_use(self)

Function to perform classification on each tile present in default tiles directory. Given CNN model is loaded to perform inference on each tile. Depending on inference result, new tile with class color representing inference result is saved locally for each source tile.

_generate_land_use_map(self, tiles_row_col, sat_img_name, original_img_arr)

Function to generate land use map for given satellite image. Land is map is generated based on mapped tiles (tiles which color represents class). First, image rows are generated from tiles, later on rows are concatenated into single image, which is final land use classification map.

Parameters

  • tiles_row_col – dict containing image dimensions in number of tiles

  • sat_image – str name of satellite image for which land use map shall be generated

  • original_img_arr – numpy array representing original sat image

run_classification(self)

Function to run classification process on given sat images. For each image, land use mask is generated using provided CNN model. Further, land use mask is applied to source image.
